abstract.p: Michael McKenna, executive vice president and chief operating officer at Marsteller Advertising, New York, is names president and chief executive...Robert Cosinuke is named president of Digitas, Boston...Robert M Copeland is named senior vice president at Young & Rubicam (S)

block.p: Michael McKenna, executive vice president and chief operating officer at Marsteller Advertising, New York, part of the Burson-Marsteller Worldwide unit of Young & Rubicam Inc., was named president and chief executive. He succeeds Joseph Fisher, now president and chief executive at Burson-Marsteller USA.
Robert Cosinuke, head for digital strategy at Digitas, Boston, was named to the new position of president at the Boston office.

Michael McKenna, executive vice president and chief operating officer at Marsteller Advertising, New York, part of the Burson-Marsteller Worldwide unit of Young & Rubicam Inc., was named president and chief executive. He succeeds Joseph Fisher, now president and chief executive at Burson-Marsteller USA.
Robert Cosinuke, head for digital strategy at Digitas, Boston, was named to the new position of president at the Boston office.

Robert M. Copeland was named to the new post of heading the New York corporate practice of Cohn & Wolfe, part of Young & Rubicam Inc., as senior vice president. He had been the principal at Copeland Communications, New York.
